Reviews.Title: “Two anatidaephobics in Venice.”
Reviews.Author: Duz Nt M
Reviews.Content: pleased stay hotel conveniently located 2 minutes walking distance vaporetto station ferrovia piazza le roma staff helpful nicely decorated warm negative charged tourist charge extra night person bathroom cleaner enjoyed stay

Reviews.Title: “Budget Hotel”

Reviews.Content: love venice hotel close train station position seeing attactions foot waterbus nearest station piazzale roma wasnt clean pretty typical continental breakfast basic enought buffet breakfast staff hotel excellent value money recomend travellers

Reviews.Title: “Bare minimum HOSTEL, small and not clean”
Reviews.Author: ycheng421
Reviews.Content: booked private bath hotel based positive reviews trip advisor greatly disappointed check hotel called hotel grand canal red awning doors story floor elevators friend luggage difficult carrying luggage flight stairs feel clean pet peeve private bathroom paid extra toilet shower head placed platform toilet shower disgusting shower toilet foot hotel actually hostel cheap wouldve paid extra cost hot water times dont amenities shower cap hand soap lobby hotel grand canal hair dryer definitely stay dont positive reviews fool venice expensive hotel beyond ridiculous positive close ferrovia station quick walk train station sights san marco vaporetto ride save time money stay elsewhere

Reviews.Content: spot short walk bridge facing railroad station canal clean bathroom expected doublebed comfy ones sunk laid id recommend mattresses tarzan hot happened ac blew air cool air called front desk didnt fault uncomfortable price paid location definitely stay

Reviews.Content: looking facilities close close main center convenient price hotel choice 12 booked shared bathroom positively surprised shared bathroom clean clean towels means transport close

Reviews.Title: “Mixed feeling”

Reviews.Content: location train florence venice venice train station grand canal basic wifi breakfast internet super expensive paying hefty price internet 30 pc absolutely unpleasant hotel doesnt own office business care door hotel staff

Reviews.Title: “Great location - good value for euro (considering this is Venice)”
Reviews.Author: NormsWife
Reviews.Content: location santa croce walk treviso airport bus santa lucia train station 510 minutes decent restaurants gift shops value leather shop block 5 minutes walk vaporetto stop check hotel services hotel doors services desk help excellent climb rickety steps bathroom lacking youd expect facecloths definitely luxurious reasonably clean budget venetian standards hotel budgeted money stayed nicer able buy nice bags saved staying

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Airone, Venice - Bad Choice!”
Reviews.Author: AngelineB1
Reviews.Content: returned recently venice booked hotel reading near train station staff polite helpful thats photos online look nice reality hits time impression bad check hotel key door apart narrow smelly mouldy staircase carpeted flooring serious replacement hotel storage moved makeshift doubling storage laundry junk suffered bites probably bedbugs written price charged justified classified nights couldnt wait sad left poor impression venice

Reviews.Title: “Ticks in the bed. That should be enough to deter you.”
Reviews.Author: raidertraveler
Reviews.Content: hotel clean surface smelled antiseptic appeared fine surface woke morning husband noticed crawling bed tick pulled comforter found person desk didnt speak english decided forget heck chose hotel price location im hotels dont blood sucking insects bed dont stay worth besides didnt bathrooms walk hall shower college didnt offer breakfast eaten food finding bugs bed shop lots venice

Reviews.Content: absolutely worse hotel stayed please listen reviews stay girlfriend booked hotel expedia figured stay due location crappiest hotel stayed extremely dirty staff clueless people walked terribly loud noises woke times night beds horrible 20 2 star cheaper hotels sad walking beautiful city day dread hotel stay
